models.enclosures

Class Enclosure<A extends AnimalInterface>

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.enclosures.Enclosure<A>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Aquarium, Aviary

    public class Enclosure<A extends AnimalInterface>
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an enclosure
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yoan Ballesteros, Antoine Sirven

      Allows to clean the enclosure Will transfer all the models.animals to a temporary enclosure to proceed

      Allows to create a temporary enclosure which has the same properties that the current instance Used for the cleaning process, as an enclosure must be emptied before cleaned

      • createTemporaryEnclosure

        public Enclosure<A> createTemporaryEnclosure()
        Allows to create a temporary enclosure which has the same properties that the current instance Used for the cleaning process, as an enclosure must be emptied before cleaned
        Returns:
        The temporary enclosure to use during cleaning, which has the same type that the original one

      • transferAnimal

        public boolean transferAnimal(A animal,
                              Enclosure<A> targetEnclosure,
                              boolean silent)
        Allows to transfer a given animal from the current enclosure to the given one
        Parameters:
        animal - The animal to transfer
        targetEnclosure - The target enclosure
        silent - Whether or not the success message should be displayed
        Returns:
        true if successful, or false if not

      • cleanEnclosure

        public void cleanEnclosure()
        Allows to clean the enclosure Will transfer all the models.animals to a temporary enclosure to proceed

        Allows to display all the enclosure's properties
